translations.name: Jerusalem Bible
translations.description: The Jerusalem Bible (JB or TJB) is the basis of the lectionary for Mass used in Catholic worship throughout the English-speaking world. It was published in 1966 by Darton, Longman & Todd. As a Catholic Bible, and includes the traditional 73 books found in most English translations until the mid-19th century in addition to footnotes and introductions.
